item.title: PhDs by Field
item.description: I had a conversation with my friend recently on what she wants to do after her undergraduate degree where she majored in Computer Science.

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis on Superheroes
item.description: In this blog post, I want to practice some EDA and Visualizations in R. I’ve taken a dataset from Kaggle on Superheroes.

item.title: Window Functions in PostgreSQL
item.description: SQL is an important tool in data science. When starting to analyze the data, it’s necessary to have to pull it together from many tables stored in various schemas.

item.title: Resume in RMarkdown
item.description: One of my professional goals this year is to use blogging as a medium to practice skills related to data science.
